name: Brave Sword
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Rapier
description: Lord/Great Lord/Lodestar only. Effective vs. Armored/Horseback units.

name: Noble Rapier
description: Lord/Great Lord/Lodestar only. Effective vs. Armored/Horseback units.

name: Eirika's Blade
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Superior Edge
description: Grants Swordbreaker skill vs. a sword wielder while equipped.

name: Falchion
description: Chrom/Marth only. Effective vs. Dragon units.

name: Exalted Falchion
description: Chrom/Marth only. Effective vs. Dragon/Fell Dragon units. When used as an item, restores 20 HP.

name: Parallel Falchion
description: Lucina/Marth only. Effective vs. Dragon/Fell Dragon units. When used as an item, restores 20 HP.

name: Ragnell
description: Infinite usage when used by enemy Priam. Defense +5.

name: Brave Lance
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Blessed Lance
description: Effective vs. Revenant units. Restores 10 HP to user each turn.

name: Superior Lance
description: Grants Lancebreaker skill vs. a lance wielder while equipped.

name: Gradivus
description: When used as an item, restores all HP.

name: Brave Axe
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Superior Axe
description: Grants Axebreaker skill vs. an axe wielder while equipped.

name: Hauteclere
description: When used as an item, restores all HP.

name: Brave Bow
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Blessed Bow
description: Effective vs. Revenants. Restores 10 HP each turn.

name: Superior Bow
description: Grants Bowbreaker skill vs a bow wielder while equipped.

name: Wolt's Bow
description: When used as an item, restores 20 HP.

name: Parthia
description: When used as an item, increases Resistance by 5. Bonus decreases by 1 each turn.

name: Book of Naga
description: Effective vs. Dragon units. Defense +5, Resistance +5.

name: Flux
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only.

name: Nosferatu
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only. Restores HP to user equal to half the damage dealt.

name: Ruin
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only.

name: Waste
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only. Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Goetia
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only.

name: Mire
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only. Cannot double attack (except in Double Duels). Negates user's offensive trigger Skills (such as Astra) and support unit's Dual Strikes.

name: Celica's Gale
description: Allows user to strike twice in one attack.

name: Aversa's Night
description: Dark Mage/Sorcerer/Tome wielders with Shadowgift only. Restores HP to user equal to half the damage dealt.

name: Heal
description: Restores a small amount of HP to an adjacent ally.

name: Mend
description: Restores a medium amount of HP to an adjacent ally.

name: Recover
description: Restores all HP to an adjacent ally.

name: Physic
description: Restores a small amount of HP to an ally.

name: Catharsis
description: Restores a large amount of HP to an ally.

name: Fortify
description: Restores a small amount of HP to all allies in range.

name: Goddess Staff
description: Restores all HP to all allies in range.

name: Rescue
description: Teleports an ally to an adjacent space to user.

name: Ward
description: Increases an adjacent ally's Resistance by 5. Bonus decreases by 1 each turn. Provides 30 EXP to the user.

name: Hammerne
description: Fully repairs an adjacent ally's weapon to full durability.

name: Kneader
description: Restores a tiny amount of HP to an adjacent ally.

name: Balmwood Staff
description: Restores HP to an adjacent ally or the user.

name: Pure Water
description: Temporarily increases Resistance by 5 during a map (effect decreases by 1 each turn).

name: HP Tonic
description: Max HP +5 until end of chapter/skirmish.

name: Strength Tonic
description: Strength +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Magic Tonic
description: Magic +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Skill Tonic
description: Skill +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Speed Tonic
description: Speed +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Luck Tonic
description: Luck +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Defense Tonic
description: Defense +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Resistance Tonic
description: Resistance +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Master Key
description: Opens a door or a chest.

name: Naga's Tear
description: Permanently raises Max HP by 5 and other stats by 2.

name: Boots
description: Permanently raises Movement by 2 (cannot be used on the same character twice).

name: Arms Scroll
description: Permanently raises the user's current weapon ranks by 1 rank.

name: Master Seal
description: Promotes a Level 10 or higher first tier unit into their second tier class promotions.

name: Second Seal
description: Reclasses a unit into another class. Effect varies on the user's current class tier and level.

name: Sweet Tincture
description: Restores a small amount of HP.

name: Gaius's Confect
description: Strength, Skill, and Speed by 2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Kris's Confect
description: Max HP +5, Defense and resistance +2 until the end of the chapter/skirmish.

name: Tiki's Tear
description: Max HP +5 and all other stats +2 until the end of the map/skirmish.

name: Seed of Trust
description: Improves support relationships when in a Pair Up (Both units must be able to support in order to work).

name: Reeking Box
description: Summons Risen on the current location on the World Map. (costs 4800G on Hard mode and above).

name: Rift Door
description: Summons a Merchant onto the current location on the World Map.

name: Supreme Emblem
description: Reward for earning 99999 Renown Points or completing Apotheosis: Secret Route. Sells for 99,999G.

name: Dread Scroll
description: Reclasses a Male Unit into the Dread Fighter class

name: Wedding Bouquet
description: Reclasses a Female Unit into the Bride class

name: Silver Card
description: Shop items can be bought at half price

name: Outrealm Item
description: An item from the Outrealms. What a DLC item looks like to a player without DLC installed
